name: Little Detective
description:
The Little Detective 

Cori Allbritton, Nathan Jahn, Trevor Taylor

You play as the reseident detective of your kindergarten class and have been given 8 tasks to complete, mainly being finding your classmates lost or confiscated belongings.

Controls:

Use WASD to move around and mouse to look around

Press E to interact with items such as:

- Picking up chairs to move

- Picking up the items from your checklist

- Open drawers

Press Q to open and close your checklist

Press R to leave the room once you have finished all your tasks

Press F to open the lock interface and enter the combination

Press Escape to pause the game
